KnowledgeArticleVoteStat.name: KnowledgeArticleVoteStat
KnowledgeArticleVoteStat.description: Provides the weighted rating for the specified article on a scale of 1 to 5 across all article types.

Channel.description: The channel where the article is rated: AllChannels for article views across all channels. App for the internal Salesforce Knowledge application. Pkb for article views in public knowledge base. Csp for Customer Portal. Prm for article view in partner portal.

NormalizedScore.description: Article's weighted score on a scale of 1 to 5. A higher score means more votes. Articles without recent votes trend towards an average rating of three stars.

ParentId.description: The rated article. This corresponds to a KnowledgeArticle record.
